definition: to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: In addition, some laws to forbid any hunting of rare animals should be passed.
sentences.chinese: 此外，人們還應制定一些法律禁止捕殺珍稀動物。

sentences.english: The invention relates to swing flapper used to kill mosquito and fly.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種用於捕殺蚊蠅的蚊甩子。

sentences.english: Personally I am not against whaling of non-threatened whales in limited numbers.
sentences.chinese: 我個人不反對捕殺限定數量的鯨魚。

sentences.english: People hunt elephants mainly for their ivory tusks.
sentences.chinese: 人類捕殺大象主要是爲了獲取象牙。

sentences.english: Neanderthal man was able to kill woolly mammoths and bears.
sentences.chinese: 尼安德特人能夠捕殺渾身覆毛的猛獁象和熊。

sentences.english: Schaller. The Chinese government has passed laws against killing pandas.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府已經通過了禁止捕殺大熊貓的法律。

sentences.english: Tool-use no doubt helped early humans in butchering their dinners.
sentences.chinese: 工具的使用無疑能夠幫助早期人類捕殺並食用獵物。

sentences.english: In addition, the government should pass some laws to forbid any hunting of rare animals.
sentences.chinese: 此外，政府應通過一些法律禁止捕殺珍稀動物。

sentences.english: Or in sleep rehearse perfect kills and eat.
sentences.chinese: 在睡眠中，也不去演習完美的捕殺和吞食。

sentences.english: Early settlers also killed beavers for their meat.
sentences.chinese: 早期的開拓者也捕殺河狸，取它們的肉。

sentences.english: Once again, The fishery agency of Japan intents to hunt 945 whales.
sentences.chinese: 日本漁業廳計劃再次捕殺945頭鯨魚。

sentences.english: The Japanese plan to kill about a thousand whales during the Antarctic summer.
sentences.chinese: 日本方面計劃在南極夏令季節捕殺約一千條鯨魚。

sentences.english: Even still, in East Africa people seldom hunt monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 即使這樣，東非的大部分人都很少捕殺猴子。

sentences.english: No one wants to admit that their tigers have been poached .
sentences.chinese: 沒有人願意承認他們的老虎受到盜獵者的捕殺。

sentences.english: Later, Defra said culling the birds would only be a last resort.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，Defra說捕殺這種鳥只會是最後一招。

sentences.english: Thousands of whales continue to be savagely hunted and killed every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年成千上萬的鯨魚被殘忍捕殺。

definition: to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
to take a risk out of desperation (idiom)
